author: tag
Koolhaas, Rem: void + anwesenheit + abwesenheit + mauer + nichts + funktion + effizienz + subtilität + flexibilität + abwesenheit

author: quote
Koolhaas, Rem: For me, it was a first demonstration of the  capacity of the void - of nothingness - to "function" with more efficiency, subtlety, and flexibility than any object you could imagine in its place. It was a warning that - in architecture - absence would always win in a contest with presence.
